ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Visualizes the main effects of individual predictor variables and their second-order interaction effects in black-box supervised learning models. The package creates either Accumulated Local Effects (ALE) plots and/or Partial Dependence (PD) plots, given a fitted supervised learning model.

Visualizes the main effects of individual predictor variables and their second-order interaction effects in black-box supervised learning models. The package creates either Accumulated Local Effects (ALE) plots and/or Partial Dependence (PD) plots, given a fitted supervised learning model.

name: r-aleplot
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.1' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-aleplot
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ALEPlot_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ALEPlot/ALEPlot_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 7ce4a9721573bb28b0bbdc4d24645955165eda9cc630fd13dc47b57e14a2532d

build:
  number: 6
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-yaimpute
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-yaimpute

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ALEPlot')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ALEPlot')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=ALEPlot
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: Visualizes the main effects of individual predictor variables and their second-order
    interaction effects in black-box supervised learning models. The package creates
    either Accumulated Local Effects (ALE) plots and/or Partial Dependence (PD) plots,
    given a fitted supervised learning model.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - philip-khor

# Package: ALEPlot
# Type: Package
# Title: Accumulated Local Effects (ALE) Plots and Partial Dependence (PD) Plots
# Version: 1.1
# Date: 2018-05-22
# Author: Dan Apley
# Maintainer: Dan Apley <apley@northwestern.edu>
# Description: Visualizes the main effects of individual predictor variables and their second-order interaction effects in black-box supervised learning models. The package creates either Accumulated Local Effects (ALE) plots and/or Partial Dependence (PD) plots, given a fitted supervised learning model.
# Imports: yaImpute
# License: GPL-2
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Suggests: R.rsp, nnet
# VignetteBuilder: R.rsp
# RoxygenNote: 6.0.1
# Packaged: 2018-05-24 15:00:22 UTC; thair
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-05-24 16:14:07 UTC
